page.title: 03CRUDWELL PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: {Crudwell school is a Church of England {Controlled Primary School}catering for boys and girls of between five and eleven years of age.It is situated in it's own grounds of two and a half acres.{The main building}which has been extended and modernised{is {Victorian.}There are also two mobile classrooms.As a Church of England Controlled School there are{close {links with the church}including visits by the Rector and church services.The present school is attended by about 120 children who are in 4 classes.The children are in school between 9am and 3pm.During this time they learn about many different things.Annual events include a Christmas sale,sports day, parents evenings and church services.
